title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.14 - Penalties and assessments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.14 - Penalties and assessments

State Regulations

Whenever an employer, carrier, physician or other person
has failed to comply with any requirement of the Disability Benefits Law, Workers' Compensation Law, art. 9, or has violated any provisions thereof, the
fines, assessments or other penalties prescribed by the law shall be imposed as
therein provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
363.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
